oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Death of Sir Edward Pakenham scene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Engraved scene, "Battle of New Orleans--Death of General Pakenham." Pakenham falls mortally wounded from his horse as British and American soldiers clash. Wounded men and a drum lie on the ground. Americans fire from the rampart. Engraved by Albert Bobbett
Major-General Sir Edward Michael Pakenham was commander of British forces at the Battle of New Orleans
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pakenham, Edward Michael, 1778-1815;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812
Campaigns & battles; Generals; Death
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Darley, Felix Octavius Carr
